channel.title: Metasploitable 2 How-to - Lab Setup and vsftp backdoor
channel.description: # Capture The Flag Vulnerable Machine Part I - Metasploitable 2 Hello Hackers and welcome to this post , in this post I will show you how you can take control of the VM **Metasploitable 2**. I will show you differents ways of taking control of this Vulnerable VM. In this first part I will cover the vsftpd Backdoored service . You can find a great tutorial on how to exploit vsftpd with python here [vsftpd exploit](https://0x00sec.org/t/re-building-a-vsftpd-backdoor-exploit-in-python/159) by @Defalt In this Tutorial, we will use the Metasploit Framework to pwned the box ## Setup the Lab First we need to download the Virtual Machine [Metasploitable 2](https://sourceforge.net/projects/metasploitable/files/Metasploitable2/) , we will need a Virtual machine who will be the attacker you can use [Kali Linux](https://www.kali.org/downloads/) , [Backbox](https://backbox.org/download) or another Hacking box :smile: If you already have **Metasploitable 2** and your Hacking Box, let's start by setting up the Lab. I will use VirtualBox in this lab ( If you want a tutorial on how to setup a Virtual Lab with VmWare player message me and I'll do one) The .zip you have downloaded will contains these files, the Metasploitable.vmdk is the file we need to make the Virtual Machine ![Metasploit file](upload://935ISdk6qDPjdQVYQbeWYIPriYd.png) ### VirtualBox Setup Let's get started ! Create a new virtual Machine **Machine > New** Name your Virtual Machine *Metasploitable 2* ![Metasploitable creation](http://i.imgur.com/7iF7dKT.png) Click Next and adjust the RAM as you needed, you can let the default option and click next ![RAM Metasploitable](http://i.imgur.com/01dDfT7.png) Here choose virtual Disk of Metasploitable 2 that you downloaded ![Metasploitale vdmk ](http://i.imgur.com/AdTU2y1.png) Click Next, you're almost done ! Now that the Virtual Machine is created, we need to configure the Network settings **Right Click on the virtual machine > Configuration > Network** ![Networking settings](http://i.imgur.com/iHXEvVk.png) I set the virtual Machine to *private network* and do the same for my Hacking box ! You're Now Ready to pwned Metasploitable 2 ## Pwned that Box ### Recon First we need to find the ip of the box we can use * nmap * netdiscover * arpscan * or something else.. Let's try netdiscover to find the ip of the box , in Kali Linux type ```linux netdiscover -r ip_range ``` ![Netdiscover output](http://i.imgur.com/z4DgDU1.png) So let's try a nmap scan on the *192.168.56.101* ![Nmap scan](http://i.imgur.com/afR03BR.jpg) Wow , a lot of open port it's our target ! Now it's time to hack it ! ## The ftp Service The ftp port is open let's check which version of software the VM runs ![vsftpd](http://i.imgur.com/NfaO8du.png) We see vsftpd 2.3.4, is this service vulnerable ? Let's run metasploit first you need to run postgresql and msfdb init : ```linux service postgresql start msfdb init ``` and then run metasploit ```linux msfconsole ``` We search if a vsftpd exploit is available ```metasploit search vsftpd ``` ![msfconsole](http://i.imgur.com/JNYtVgW.png) We found an exploit ! let's use this exploit ```metasploit use exploit/unix/ftp/vsftpd_234_backdoor ``` The show options will show you what variable should be set for the exploit to work We set the remote host **RHOST** and type exploit Now we have a root shell ! Okay, now that we exploit the box with this vsftpd backdoor let's figured out how it works First open the source code of the exploit with your favorite editor If we look at the source code we see that the exploit will open **the port 6200** when we use a random string terminated by a :) as a username and a random string for password Now let's open wireshark to see what's happen on the network let's filter **ftp** and port **6200** and retry the exploit So when we lauched the exploit the first thing you could notice is that it tries to connect to port 6200 If the port is not open we send the random string terminated with a smiley for the **USER** and a random string to **PASS** that will open the port **6200** As you can see on the screenshot above when the user LC:) , And nPSc are sent The next frame our machine will retry to connect to port 6200 and it works ! We can type ```linux netstat -tnp ``` on Metasploitable 2 we will see that our Kali linux machine is connected to the port 6200 Here is the end of **Metasploitable 2 part I** Hope you enjoy reading ! Stay tuned for the next part **Metasploitable 2 - IRC ** @L3akM3-0day

item.title: Metasploitable 2 How-to - Lab Setup and vsftp backdoor
item.dc:creator: L3akM3-0day
item.description:
Capture The Flag Vulnerable Machine Part I - Metasploitable 2

Hello Hackers and welcome to this post , in this post I will show you how you can take control of the VM Metasploitable 2. I will show you differents ways of taking control of this Vulnerable VM. In this first part I will cover the vsftpd Backdoored service . You can find a great tutorial on how to exploit vsftpd with python here vsftpd exploit by @Defalt

In this Tutorial, we will use the Metasploit Framework to pwned the box

Setup the Lab

First we need to download the Virtual Machine Metasploitable 2 , we will need a Virtual machine who will be the attacker you can use Kali Linux , Backbox or another Hacking box

If you already have Metasploitable 2 and your Hacking Box, letâ€™s start by setting up the Lab.

I will use VirtualBox in this lab ( If you want a tutorial on how to setup a Virtual Lab with VmWare player message me and Iâ€™ll do one)

The .zip you have downloaded will contains these files, the Metasploitable.vmdk is the file we need to make the Virtual Machine

VirtualBox Setup

Letâ€™s get started !
Create a new virtual Machine
Machine > New
Name your Virtual Machine Metasploitable 2

Click Next and adjust the RAM as you needed, you can let the default option and click next

Here choose virtual Disk of Metasploitable 2 that you downloaded

Click Next, youâ€™re almost done ! Now that the Virtual Machine is created, we need to configure the Network settings
Right Click on the virtual machine > Configuration > Network

I set the virtual Machine to private network and do the same for my Hacking box !

Youâ€™re Now Ready to pwned Metasploitable 2

Pwned that Box

Recon

First we need to find the ip of the box we can use

  • nmap
  • netdiscover
  • arpscan
  • or something elseâ€¦

Letâ€™s try netdiscover to find the ip of the box , in Kali Linux type

netdiscover -r ip_range

So letâ€™s try a nmap scan on the 192.168.56.101

Wow , a lot of open port itâ€™s our target ! Now itâ€™s time to hack it !

The ftp Service

The ftp port is open letâ€™s check which version of software the VM runs

We see vsftpd 2.3.4, is this service vulnerable ?
Letâ€™s run metasploit

first you need to run postgresql and msfdb init :

service postgresql start
msfdb init

and then run metasploit

msfconsole

We search if a vsftpd exploit is available

search vsftpd

We found an exploit ! letâ€™s use this exploit

use exploit/unix/ftp/vsftpd_234_backdoor

The show options will show you what variable should be set for the exploit to work

We set the remote host RHOST and type exploit

Now we have a root shell !

Okay, now that we exploit the box with this vsftpd backdoor letâ€™s figured out how it works

First open the source code of the exploit with your favorite editor


If we look at the source code we see that the exploit will open the port 6200 when we use a random string terminated by a as a username and a random string for password

Now letâ€™s open wireshark to see whatâ€™s happen on the network
letâ€™s filter ftp and port 6200 and retry the exploit

So when we lauched the exploit the first thing you could notice is that it tries to connect to port 6200
If the port is not open we send the random string terminated with a smiley for the USER and a random string to PASS that will open the port 6200

As you can see on the screenshot above when the user
LC:) , And nPSc are sent

The next frame our machine will retry to connect to port 6200 and it works !

We can type

netstat -tnp

on Metasploitable 2 we will see that our Kali linux machine is connected to the port 6200

Here is the end of Metasploitable 2 part I

Hope you enjoy reading ! Stay tuned for the next part **Metasploitable 2 - IRC **

@L3akM3-0day
